name: Villa Poggio San Felice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose to have our wedding reception here and it is a beautiful place. Amazing views over Florence and the surrounding countryside, lovely gardens, villa has lots of character and Lorenzo is very friendly and helpful. The villa is well situated in that it provides a good base to explore the surrounding countryside or the centre of Florence as desired. Can't wait to go back for our 1st anniversary!
reviews.title: Beautiful Tuscan Villa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is fantastic and the house is beautiful - there is also a modern and clean swimming pool and the view from the house over Florence is wonderful but we felt the service was not at all welcoming or warm. Lorenzo was polite but he hardly spoke a word to us and when I attempted to chat to him he pretty much cut me dead. He showed us to our room and then dissapeared and I had to go and find him to find out about the best way to get into the city because we didn't want to drive (he'd not mentioned anything about the shuttle bus although I'd read about it on the website), the best way to get home in the evening (advice on taxis etc) and basic questions about breakfast and check out because he'd told us nothing.
reviews.title: Beautiful location but questionable service

reviews.text: I wouldn't say he was rude but we got the feeling that we weren't particularly welcome and it did very much effect our stay. It was a real shame because the whole experience could have been so much better. As a result we won't be going back there.
reviews.title: A wedding in my favorite place in the world....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Villa Poggio San Felice is hands down the BEST place to stay in Florence. I had my wedding at the villa this past December and every time I think about how beautiful the weddding was, how warm and inviting the rooms were and the service provided by Lorezo and Livia and always start to tear up. Lorenzo was so patient with my parents, who needed special attention. He really went above and beyond as a host.The breakfast was phenomenal and Lorenzo always drove us into the heart of Florence every morning. During our stay, my husband and I regreted booking a room at a 5 star hotel our last night in Florence rather than staying at the villa. (If only we had known...)
reviews.title: Pinch me!
A beautiful, magical place
reviews.text: The whole experience was simply magical and does not get anybetter that what I experienced. One of my favorite places in the world....

aka: Villa Poggio San Felice Hotel Florence
